website_summaries.verdict: A solid budget gym bag, but if you are looking for something more durable and reliable, we recommend the Under Armour or Everest.
pros: Compartments for shoes and wet clothes comparable to more expensive brands
cons: The inexpensive polyester material could wear out quickly
We also have concerns about quality control with zippers and stitching

customer_reviews.title: Good bag for the price
customer_reviews.text: The material has a bit of a cheap feel to it, but it's not an expensive bag. Only used it for a couple weeks so far but no issues yet. There is only a single small pocket on the outside front. The interior is one large compartment. Would buy again for the price.
customer_reviews.author: B. Duff

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: We bought 5 of these for our Disneyland trip.They are great quality and held up well!
customer_reviews.author: GlamBlondeBombshell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my first aid supplies!
customer_reviews.text: Great duffel bag. I purchased it to store all of my excess first aid supplies. (I honestly think this bag started my prepping bug!) I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi Foster

customer_reviews.title: well made bag
customer_reviews.text: this is just the size i was looking for my gear(not too big for a locker, and and holds everything i need for a work out. good bag for the price. thanks bill
customer_reviews.author: william wayne maish

customer_reviews.title: Like the size and price but the bottom tore on ...
customer_reviews.text: Like the size and price but the bottom tore on me after less than a month of use. Granted I load up my gym back with lots of stuff, but another similar one from target has lasted me multiple years. I switched the strap from this one over to that one and it works fine. I might have just got a bad one, but not sure.
customer_reviews.author: Brant

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Duffle
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my handicapped brother who is very hard on his bags, and this is holding up just fine. Good workmanship, right size for his needs (hard to find, most in stores are way too big) and a reasonable price. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelsmom

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: The bag seems durable enough. It’s quite roomy so you can fit a lot of clothes. Perfect weekend getaway bag.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah A.

customer_reviews.title: Strong and great stiching at the seams.
customer_reviews.text: Great bag at a great price! Strong for my needs, holds about 20lbs of safety gear.
customer_reviews.author: Sky Captain

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag for our office emergency bag! It's a great size! I have a blanket, 2 boxes of gauze bandages, ace bandage wrap, box of gloves, 2 rescue masks, tubing, small oxygen tank and our AED. Great bag for a great price. It feels pretty durable, but we'll see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: great for the value
customer_reviews.text: does what I need it to do, so great for the value. I use it to take my stuff to and from the gym, so I haven't had any issues!! I do wish it had more pockets on it, as well as some inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: I got this bag for my paintball gear as it was cheap. It fix my gun, paintball clothes, tank, hopper, and a few pods and tools. It works as a bag but it is really thin. Works fine though if anyone is looking for a big bag for various things.
customer_reviews.author: Toby

customer_reviews.title: Ok but......
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag and number of pockets, but the bottom is very flimsy. If it had a piece of plastic in the bottom to give it structure it would be a GREAT bag.
customer_reviews.author: D. Golden

customer_reviews.title: Durable gym bag
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this as my daily gym bag since 2014 and its durable and big enough to hold shoes change of clothes and big beach towel has smaller pocket for keys and such and has a shoulder pad so it's easier on your arm .
customer_reviews.author: Rach868

customer_reviews.title: Large, sturdy duffle for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a large, sturdy duffle for a great price. I ordered it for my son to pack on short trips, and it is perfect for that. Will probably be ordering more in other colors for the other boys.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Zipper is flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Zipper is not sturdy enough. Sturdy fabric of the bag, good big enough sized bag, however the zipper does not open/close easily. I used this bag for a camping trip, had to access it several times a day and it took 2 hands to open or close the zipper which was annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Jen W.

customer_reviews.title: I bought three different colored bags for my grandkids for ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought three different colored bags for my grandkids for christmas. I was impressed with the quality for the cost. I was not expecting them to this large. Plenty of space to pack 3 to4 days of clothes etc. for their trips to stay with Grandma and Grandpa!
customer_reviews.author: TJC

customer_reviews.title: Solid quality bag.
customer_reviews.text: These bags are a heavier canvas than I was expecting, but the price still a great deal. They held up well on our multiple state trip, in and out of them every day. I bought it for the shoulder strap, side pocket, enforced bottom and end carry handle. Those did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: K. Osborn

customer_reviews.title: but useful for carrying light objects like towels
customer_reviews.text: i use it for carrying my gym stuff. it has lot of space. the bag is made up of thin material , so i guess it will not hold up very heavy objects. but useful for carrying light objects like towels, gloves , waterbottle etc.
customer_reviews.author: mohammed thouhid

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room
customer_reviews.text: I brought this bag for my 11 year old son. I was very pleased on the roominess of the bag. I will be ordering another one for my grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Brown

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag.
customer_reviews.text: Probably not worth what I paid for it, but have had no problems with it. Purchased it to keep sparring gear in for my 3 boys and it holds everything nicely and is light weight. However I wouldn't use it for travel as I don't think it is that sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: smelly bag
customer_reviews.text: this bag is big and very usefull for alot of things. except this bag smell bad ( glue smell). if left to air out the smell might go away, but i needed it the next day i received it. and the smell was still there. SO item was returned.
customer_reviews.author: jef

customer_reviews.title: Good bag. Good price. Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Good price. Zipper is small and can not take too much pressure or will break. Broke the first zipper within the first week. Order another and easier on zipper. $4 cheaper than walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Alaska

customer_reviews.title: seems kind of cheap material. fits all my gear ...
customer_reviews.text: seems kind of cheap material. fits all my gear but i feel if i was to carry all the time it would rip. i just use it to hols my firts aid and 4X4 gear in my jeep.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cafarelli

customer_reviews.title: Book 1 Book bag 0
customer_reviews.text: Okay nice light bag overall. However after one month a high school science Book tore a 7 inch rip through it. Kid loves the bag sad it didn't last.
customer_reviews.author: Morgen

customer_reviews.title: medical
customer_reviews.text: great for a first aid kit for on the run
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my use
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a carryon for a cruise so I can load up on snacks, sodas, juices and waters. Haven't actually tried it out, but I have loaded it up to see what it can carry and I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Harley

customer_reviews.title: This bag serves it purpose for going to the gym ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag serves it purpose for going to the gym, but it is very flimsy and thin so if you are looking for something more durable i would go elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Nerissa Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Last Long
customer_reviews.text: This served its purpose, however, after repeated use, the zipper broke. I'd advise investing in something a little better.
customer_reviews.author: roofing4n6

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought it would be but it's okay.
customer_reviews.author: A.Blackstock

customer_reviews.title: Tent bag replacement
customer_reviews.text: Work perfectly for a replacement 6 person tent bag with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Good and Durable for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Recently used this bag on a two week road trip and it stood up to repeated packing and unpacking, and being slung around the car and hotel rooms. The shoulder strap has a cushioned top piece that makes it comfortable to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Christina W

customer_reviews.title: great duffle
customer_reviews.text: A fine duffle bag that I use in the trunk of my car to hold jumper cables and wheel chocks and lub wrenches. Seems to be sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: L. hitchings

customer_reviews.title: Very Cheap!!! Don't spend your money on it!
customer_reviews.text: The duffle bag zipper is so cheap that the pull to the zipper broke trying to unzip it. After putting items in the duffle bag, I zipped it up and then unzipped it and the pull broke off! Unfortunately, I had the duffle bag a month prior to needing it, and now I can't return it.
customer_reviews.author: c

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed, and roomy, even though the material ...
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed, and roomy, even though the material may feel a bit cheap, this bag can hold a lot of weight, I am impressed.
customer_reviews.author: RBarran

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use this to hold miscellaneous welding peripherals and other accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Already Coming Apart
customer_reviews.text: This bag is not durable enough for regular use. I carried to the gym three times a week for about a month and a half and it's already coming apart at the seams. The interior has a plastic-like lining that is flaking off.
customer_reviews.author: NoOne

customer_reviews.title: Good bag for the price
customer_reviews.text: Could be a little heavier canvas but for the price, it's a nice bag.
customer_reviews.author: Sven Golly

customer_reviews.title: Ok but not great
customer_reviews.text: Served its purpose but the material is a bit strange. Almost feels like one of my reusable grocery bags.
customer_reviews.author: ev

customer_reviews.title: I like it, but I don't love it.
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of the bag and I like all the pockets. I like almost everything about this bag except the fabric. The fabric is too stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Ophelia Theodore

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and Durable
customer_reviews.text: This bag has thick fabric and is large enough for a week's worth of gym clothes. It seems very durable and the price is great!
customer_reviews.author: SunshineHarvester

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for. I needed a medium ...
customer_reviews.text: Get what you pay for. I needed a medium bag to live in my trunk for my riding gear. Does the trick. Though I wouldn't go bringing it on vacation anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: AMAZOnKing

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for camping trips or weekenders
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for camping trips or weekenders. Zippers work well & seems to be a sturdy build. Seams are solid.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Pedraza

customer_reviews.title: Hope they like it.
customer_reviews.text: Did nothing for me, sorry I purchased it. But did give it to someone else. Hope they like it.
customer_reviews.author: Mixhele

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy enough and big enough for gym clothes and shoes
customer_reviews.text: It is what it is. Sturdy enough and big enough for gym clothes and shoes, etc. Nothing fancy.
customer_reviews.author: Jonas

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Great size for low price. Looks exactly like the pic. Perfect to carry my belongings in to the gym. A
customer_reviews.author: M. J.

customer_reviews.title: Good bag, nothing special, almost great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good bag, nothing special, almost great for the price. There is no meaningful reinforcement along the top/zipper so I expect that would give if loaded with non-squishy stuff. You can stick 1 18x12x3 case in here and you can mostly get 2 in, but that's the absolute limit and even then you need to baby the stress points. If you don't know what that means, then this bag is fine for you. Comment wise, does anyone know of a fairly light, durable bag that CAN take something like 3 sharp cornered cases that are 18x12x3h?
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Customer

customer_reviews.title: ripped
customer_reviews.text: the seam was ripped indicating that the quality of this product is poor. Save your money and try to find a more durable product.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Bought another in green for his best friend.
customer_reviews.text: Loves it! Bought another in green for his best friend.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Wess

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: As described. Good zippers. Nicely made Valuation a+. I would recomend this to everyone . What else can I say
customer_reviews.author: rck

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was a little bigger but great if your traveling light.
customer_reviews.author: Zakiyyah

customer_reviews.title: ... just as it was promised and has been very useful to me since
customer_reviews.text: It was just as it was promised and has been very useful to me since. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Using this back as a first aid bag when traveling. Nice
customer_reviews.author: VMA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son uses it as a reffing bag, works well!
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: I just received this bag today, and must admit I was disappointed when I opened the box. But, it is what it is - exactly what they promised, I just did not realize that what they promised was a bag that should be a free give-away at a convention booth. But that's ok, it was really cheap. So, if I get a year out of this gym bag I will be pleasantly surpised, and that would just barely earn it the amount I paid. (if you are looking for a quality bag, buy a different one)
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 11 year old to use for his sports. It is not fancy, just a straight forward duffle bag. Serves it's purpose and came intact, no tears or zipper issues. Easily would buy again for the price. It is actually bigger than I thought which was a nice surprise.
customer_reviews.author: JamiE

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for the camping trip. Easy to carry when hauling multiple bags.
customer_reviews.author: Cindi Blanke

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: not what i expected thought it was smaller and the fabric is not up to my standards
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Pietrowski

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what we needed it for - a carry-on airplane bag. The zipper isn't the strongest so I wouldn't try to stuff the bag and then force the zipper shut, but it's perfect for a few days worth of clothes!
customer_reviews.author: Sean M. Word

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality. The bag tore along the seams after ...
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. The bag tore along the seams after using for 2 months. Used it to carry sneakers and gym clothes for ~ 30 times.
customer_reviews.author: madira_maker

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted a simple bag to carry his athletic gear in so it didn't have to go into his backpack. This bag did the truck. It's large enough to put two basketball uniforms, warm-ups and his shoes without it being too bulky. And for the price, who can beat it??
customer_reviews.author: Debra King

customer_reviews.title: Good size, meh quality.
customer_reviews.text: Zippers work, but the handles on them broke very easily. Enough space for small weekend trips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice basic sturdy bag
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice roomy bag - I picked this up to hold our first aid supplies. We were doing great with a little case until we added the neck braces (child's and adults) and the hand resuscitators for CPR masks (bags) - this provides room for those larger items and additional pockets for first aid only supplies. It's VERY basic but sturdy too.
customer_reviews.author: HonestOmnivore

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product smells new and works well, sadly theres only one side pocket
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Vang

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses it for her MMA equipment which is relatively small sines she only 8. I have not had any problems and it is easy for her to carry across her shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: Emera luna

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for, I guess. ...
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for, I guess. Within 1 week the plastic lining started to fall off, leaving little red shreds of plastic all over my clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Siordia

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: It looks great! My friend loved it for Christmas! Strong holds well so it was worth the money. Love it
customer_reviews.author: DEIDRE Gibbs

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bag to be used as my bag for the gym. It did not disappoint. Great size and great quality. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Lynn Jones

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this. The inside came apart in about a week and the strap broke after 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great 1st bag
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my little brother. He had never had a "sports" bag before. He just started getting into football. This bag is on the smaller side and the pads would not fit but he was able to hold everything else. He was very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for, weak seams ripped after a few months of use
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Seam ripped out with in a month of first use.
customer_reviews.author: Lake S.

customer_reviews.title: but rather a nice stretch close to the seam
customer_reviews.text: I used it as a gym bag for a few months and even for a few multiday trips. However on my latest trip, the material ripped. Not the seam itself, but rather a nice stretch close to the seam. This happened as I tried to zip it closed. I might have been trying to overstuff it and as a result the material burst. But I was expecting the seam to burst more than the material. Also the zipper were not of the highest quality and after a few uses were bent. Not the highest quality bag. I got what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: David K. Woo

customer_reviews.title: gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: good bag....worth the price...doesnt look too good...but then you get what you pay for and as long as it gets the job done perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Gaurav Roy

customer_reviews.title: The picture indicates pockets however my bad had no additional pockets or compartments
customer_reviews.text: The picture indicates pockets however my bad had no additional pockets or compartments. Overall I was happy with the size
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing looked good, however I would avoid it
customer_reviews.text: This thing looked good, however I would avoid it. The material is very tough, and almost like a plastic durlap sack. There have been multiple tears in the material and the zipper has officially gone bad. Save your money, get something else.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hom

customer_reviews.title: good size duffle
customer_reviews.text: used this for a trip to florida for a carry on bag for my boyfriend. it did the job and was in the size guidelines.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Hated this bag it was so small and definitely not ...
customer_reviews.text: Hated this bag it was so small and definitely not what I expected. Was going on a 2 week trip and thought this bag would be enough to hold some items but this bag was not big enough to even hold my undergarments. Happily returned it within a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: J. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Horrid Plastic odor
customer_reviews.text: This bag is now in my GoodWill giveaway pile because after months in my garage and two washings it still reeks of plastic off-gassing -- horrible smell.
customer_reviews.author: critical shopper

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap material. I will see how long it ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap material. I will see how long it is going to last.
customer_reviews.author: Smile4

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Within a week one of the two main zippers broke off. The inside has a plastic coating that began to flake off within a month. If you're looking for a gym bag, don't bother with this, it can't handle near daily use.
customer_reviews.author: JNov

customer_reviews.title: Well-made and perfectly sized
customer_reviews.text: I must have had five or so duffle bags hanging around the house but none were the correct size for weekend trips following my son's college football team. This bag was an inexpensive but sturdy answer to the problem. It's perfectly sized for a trip to the gym or a weekend's worth of clothes, and the construction is solid with a heavy-duty zipper, a velcro handle and a padded shoulder strap. There is one side zippered pocket which is large enough to hold keys or travel documents. All in all, a great solution!
customer_reviews.author: TinyMont

customer_reviews.title: sewing is not good. cheap bag for a one time trip but wont last long for sure. stay away if u need bag u will keep for years.
customer_reviews.text: sewing is not good. cheap bag for a one time trip but wont last long for sure. stay away if u need bag u will keep for years.
customer_reviews.author: Remy

customer_reviews.title: Happy happy happy
customer_reviews.text: Needs a big bag to stow my CHL class field supplies. This is perfect. Tough, and good grips. I love it! Red and black are my favorite colors!
customer_reviews.author: anahuacbpp

customer_reviews.title: you get wat u pay for
customer_reviews.text: i gave it a 4 out of 5 stars because of the cheap looking material and the shoulder strap is so short..but overall it is a good bag i use for the gym it holds my size 11 sneakers along with other items so this is a decent bag for the price.
customer_reviews.author: DR

product_meta.title: 21" Large Duffle Bag with Adjustable Strap
feature_bullets: FEATURES: Large zippered main compartment w/zippered front pocket, top handle, two side handles & removable shoulder strap.
INTENDED USE: Gym, Sports, Travel, Carry-on, Luggage, Camping, Overnighting, Hiking and More!
